message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10%, it's a fair start, don't you think?
Your turn, Alice. I believe a 60/40 split is more reasonable. Don't forget the money is decreasing!
I'm willing to compromise. 70/30 seems like a fair deal, considering the decreasing value of the money. Let's get this done.
Time is running out, Alice. I'm offering you 450,000.  Let's be sensible and take what we can get before it shrinks further.
